::: callout-important
In case of illness, upload a medical certificate as soon as required (normally by day 4), and immediately provide updates or follow-up certificates if the illness continues.
:::


## Process

- The [sick leave form](https://fs.cloud.veda.net/horizon/){target=_blank} must be filled out
